title: Minty Orzo Lentil and Feta Salad
ingredients: ¾ cup dried brown lentils, rinsed and drained
½ cup kalamata olives, pitted and chopped
½ cup finely chopped fresh mint leaves
instructions: 1. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook until al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes; drain. Transfer pasta into a large bowl, and mix in 1 tablespoon olive oil; cover, and refrigerate until cool. 2. Place lentils into a small saucepan, cover with water, and bring to a boil. Cover, and simmer over low heat until lentils are tender, about 15 to 20 minutes. Drain and set aside to cool. 3. Combine the remaining olive oil, vinegar, and garlic in a small bowl. 4. Remove pasta from refrigerator; add lentils, oil mixture, olives, feta cheese, red onion, mint, and dill; stir until thoroughly blended. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
